He's little boy and the dog put frog in jar. They very happy. So they go to bed. That night, while they sleep, frog go out. Frog go for walk.

Next morning, frog gone. He go away. They can't believ what happen. Little boy look in shoes. He look everywhere. Dog look back in jar. His head got stuck.

So they open window. Start yell for frog. 'Frog where you?' Dog losing balance. He fall out window. Dog break jar off head. Lick boy. Boy not happy. Jar broken.

So they go into forest. Look for frog. Dog play with bumblebees. Boy look down in hole. Dog playing with bumblebees. Trying to catch.

Boy lean in. Say 'Frog where you?' Prairie dog come out. Smack him in nose. Dog howling. Bumblebees hanging from beehive. Owl jump out. Knock boy down. Bumblebees chase dog.

Boy climb on big rock. Say 'Frog where you?' He holding onto branch. But it deer's antler! Boy get stuck. Deer run. Dog come with. Deer stop at edge. Down go boy and dog. Right into water. Splash.

Boy hear something. Say 'Shh' to dog. 'Let's look on other side of log.' What they see? Mommy frog. Daddy frog. Whole family of frog. They take little friend frog. Say goodbye. Go home. Everyone happy. The end.

**Example 11**
*Context:* A story about a little boy, a dog, and a frog in the forest.
*Adult Input:* "The little boy and the dog put their frog into a jar. They were very happy. So they decided to go to bed. That night, while they were sleeping, the frog decided he was going to get out and go for a little walk. When the little boy and the dog wake up the next morning, the frog was gone. He went away. They couldn't believe what happened. The little boy looked in his shoes; he looked everywhere. The dog looked back in the jar to see where the frog went, but his head got stuck in the jar. So they decide to open up the window and started yelling for the frog. 'Frog, where are you?' The little dog seems to be losing his balance and he fell out the window. The dog broke the jar off his head and licked the boy. The boy didn't seem very happy that the jar was broken. So they decide to go out into the forest and looked for the frog. The dog was interested in some bumblebees that were coming from a beehive. The little boy looked down in a hole. The little dog was playing with the bumblebees and trying to catch them. The boy leaned in and said 'Frog where are you?' A prairie dog came out and smacked him in the nose. The dog was howling at the bumblebees hanging from their beehive. An owl jumped out of the tree and knocked the little boy down. The bumblebees went on a chase after the dog. The boy climbed up on a big rock and said 'Frog, where are you?' He was holding onto a branch. But it was actually the antler of a big deer! The boy got stuck on the deer's head. The deer decided to run to get him off his head. The dog was coming with him because he was worried. The deer stopped at the edge of a cliff and down went the little boy and the dog. Right into the water. Splash. The boy heard something. He said 'Shh' to the dog. 'Let's look on the other side of this log.' And what did they see? A mommy and daddy frog and a whole family of frogs. They took their little friend frog, said goodbye to the family, and went home. Everyone was happy. The end."
*DLD Output:* "He (i)s put frog in the... jar. They (i)s very happy. So they (i)s go to bed. That night... frog go out. Frog go away. They (i)s... they (i)s can n(o)t believe. He looked in his shoes. He looked everywhere. Dog look... back in the jar. His head get stuck. So they open up the window. They yell for frog. Frog where are you? He fell out the window. He broke the jar. He lick the boy. He (i)s not happy. So they go out in the... forest. They look for frog. Dog see bumblebees. He (i)s playing with bumblebees. He (i)s trying to catch. Boy lean in. Frog where are you? Prairie dog come out. He smack him in the nose. Dog howling. Bumblebees chasing dog. Boy climb up. He (i)s holding onto... a branch. It (i)s deer antler! Boy get stuck. Deer run. Dog coming with him. Deer stop at the edge. Down they go. In the water. Splash. Boy hear something. He (i)s say shh to dog. Let's look on the other side. And what did they see? Mommy frog... daddy frog. And whole family. They take frog. Say goodbye. Go home. Everyone happy. The end."

So they decide to open up the window. And started yelling for the frog. 'Frog, where are you?' The little dog seems to be losing his balance. And he fell out the window. The dog broke the jar off his head. And licked the boy. The boy didn't seem very happy that the jar was broken.

So they decide to go out into the forest. And looked for the frog. The dog was interested in some bumblebees. That were coming from a beehive. The little boy looked down in a hole. The little dog was playing with the bumblebees. And trying to catch them. Catch.

The boy leaned in and said 'Frog where are you?' A prairie dog came out. And smacked him in the nose. The dog was howling at the bumblebees hanging from their beehive. An owl jumped out of the tree. And knocked the little boy down. The bumblebees went on a chase after the dog.

The boy climbed up on a big rock. And said 'Frog, where are you?' He was holding onto a branch. But it was actually the antler of a big deer! The boy got stuck on the deer's head. The deer decided to run to get him off his head. The dog was coming with him because he was worried. The deer stopped at the edge of a cliff. And down went the little boy and the dog. Right into the water. Splash.

The boy heard something. He said 'Shh' to the dog. 'Let's look on the other side of this log.' And what did they see? A mommy and daddy frog. And a whole family of frogs. They took their little friend frog. Said goodbye to the family. And went home. Everyone was happy. The end.
